title: The Family Twins

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Make someone part of your family, converting them to The Grandma, The Father or The Brother. You will always convert them to the Grandma if there isnt one, then the Father if there isnt one, and finally The Brother if there isnt one. Maximum of 4 members in your Family you included.
-Make someone visit your house, roleblocking them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Your Family does not count as an actual faction and this role spawns in Neutral (Killing) slots.
-Your Family has a Factional Kill and a Factional Chat.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See only the Family remain at the end of the game. (REF goal)

desc:
Post 2405
*You're not a real family unless you have a landline.*
